Headline: #88 Higgins Temporary Reroute at Higgins/Nordica
ShortDescription: 88 Higgins buses are temporarily rerouted via Higgins, Foster, Harlem, and HIggins due to fire department activity near Higgins/Nordica.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#88 Higgins buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Higgins, Foster, Harlem, and HIggins due to fire department activity near Higgins/Nordica.

Allow extra travel time.
